translations.name: Bishops' Bible
translations.description: The Bishops' Bible is an English Bible published in 1568 by order of the Anglican Church and substantially revised in 1572. The edition that was published in 1602 edition was one of the base texts for the King James Bible of 1611. It was circulated as an alternative to the severely Calvinistic Geneva Bible.
